docstring.long_description: This block should also work with compatible Tektronix AFG31XXX instruments.
docstring.short_description: Set impedances and turn the outputs on or off.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_AFG31000 block).

parameters.name: ch1
parameters.description: Turn channel 1 output on or off.

parameters.name: ch2
parameters.description: Turn channel 2 output on or off.
